oai_dc:dc.dc:title: After a Zeppelin raid in London
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This poster from World War I shows a hospital scene. A father and daughter are grieving the death of his wife and her mother while two medical professionals look on. The text of the poster reads ""After A Zeppelin Raid in London. 'But Mother Had Done Nothing Wrong, Had She, Daddy?"" Prevent this in New York, Invest in Liberty Bonds.""
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Liberty Loan Committee
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: World War I and World War II Poster Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; Posters
